name: Death's Approach
description:
Controls

- Move with WASD or Arrow Keys
- Run with Shift
- Attack with Left mouse button

Description

You are a simple person ready to die. But all of the sudden, you fall further down in the grave. Death is not happy about this. However... You still have a chance of survival!

Although you are still destined to die... But you can delay the inevitable!

Kill enemies in your path. Just more souls for Death to collect, so you have more time to escape!

Progress deeper in the dungeon, and get as far as you can!
